title: The Shadow Integration Path
subtitle: Complete journey from discovery to integration
description: Master shadow work from beginner to advanced. This bundle takes you through understanding your shadow, working with your inner parts, and integrating what you discover for lasting transformation.

title: Nervous System Restoration
subtitle: Regulate, restore, and build resilience
description: A comprehensive approach to healing your nervous system. From understanding trauma responses to building somatic awareness and breathwork mastery.

title: Relationship Healing Bundle
subtitle: From attachment wounds to conscious connection
description: Transform your relationships by understanding attachment patterns, healing codependency, and learning conscious communication and connection.

title: Anxiety Freedom Path
subtitle: Comprehensive anxiety healing toolkit
description: Everything you need to understand and work with anxiety. From first-aid techniques to deep nervous system work and ongoing regulation practices.

title: Emotional Mastery Bundle
subtitle: Feel, process, and express with skill
description: Develop emotional intelligence and regulation skills. Learn to work with anger, release stuck emotions, and build a healthy relationship with your inner world.

title: Purpose & Meaning Bundle
subtitle: Discover your path and live it fully
description: Find clarity on your life direction. Explore purpose, meaning, and how to align your daily life with what truly matters to you.

title: Self-Worth Recovery Bundle
subtitle: Rebuild from the foundation up
description: Heal shame, recover from people-pleasing, build authentic confidence, and develop unshakeable self-worth from the inside out.

title: Mindfulness & Meditation Bundle
subtitle: Build a lasting contemplative practice
description: Develop meditation skills from fundamentals to mastery. Learn presence practices, mindfulness techniques, and create sustainable daily rituals.
